content.p: We offer a range of services to meet a variety of needs, including: Suitable for children from 4 months to 5 years. Find out more about our Day Nursery. Find out more about the Playcentre. Suitable for children from 4 to 12 years. Find out more about our Playscheme and download the application form. We aim to be flexible wherever possible and where vacancies permit. Childcare Services also offers a Toy Library and further information can be found here. We close on all bank holidays (eight) and University holidays (five) and for two in-service education and training events per annum. A full year plan is available which lists the dates of all closures, the weeks included in a term-time only place (Playcentre only) and the dates on which the Playscheme will be operating. There is also a Busy Bees Nursery available on campus. To find out more, please visit www.busybeeschildcare.co.uk or call BusyBees directly on 0115 9229117. The University of Nottingham University Park Nottingham NG7 2RD telephone: +44 (0) 115 951 5222 email: childcareservices@nottingham.ac.uk The use of images from this site is strictly prohibited. Images are not to be used or reproduced under any circumstances.
